Name: HeatStroke
About the game: Nothing but desert wind, cactuses and the scribes writing down your every move for miles. HeatStroke is barely a game, tasking you to transcribe short story while driving down a seemingly endless desert road. An excess of typing. A landscape that grows progressively stranger. A dynamic radio you can tune into at any time. An original short story.
